Name: Vanilla WL
SeedDescription: Grows in summer in 13 days. After maturity gives a few vanilla beans.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Cresce no verão em 13 dias. Após o amadurecimento, dá alguns grãos de baunilha.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Растет летом за 13 дней. После созревания дает несколько ванильных палочек.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 在夏季13天内生长。成熟后会产生一些香草豆。
